description:
Find 5 items hidden in the pictures of World Heritage sites.
This is a game that provides brain training while enjoying the feeling of traveling.

It is easy to play.
・Memorize the items of the theme well.
・Find the items hidden in the pictures.
・When you know where the item is, select the location with the cursor.

This game is easy to enjoy, so it’s a great way to pass the time in your spare time!

When you are not sure where the item is, or if you can’t figure it out,try pressing the ““Hint”” button.
(I’ll give you a big hint that you can almost understand)
name: Treasure Hunt on a World Trip
intro: Let’s find the hidden secret items in the photos of World Heritage sites!
